name: Robot hive
description:
Create your army of robots !

In this game, you must create robot, program their AI so that their task is automated, and accumulate more  ressources !

Create their AI with javascript, not some weird language ! All the power of javascript is for you to use to make the most efficient harvesters !

Made in 7 days for the 100 dollars gam jam. This project is far from the version I imagined due to time constraint, but it can be fun to  mess with  :)
